query:
-- Totais ATUAIS no banco
SELECT 
  'ATUAL' as momento,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos) as mercados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes) as clientes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes) as concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads) as leads,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes_mercados) as associacoes

UNION ALL

-- Totais do ENRICHMENT RUN (o que ele reportou criar)
SELECT 
  'CRIADO NO RUN' as momento,
  mercados_criados as mercados,
  clientes_processados as clientes,
  concorrentes_criados as concorrentes,
  leads_criados as leads,
  NULL as associacoes
FROM enrichment_runs
WHERE status = 'paused'
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1;
